result_list.explanation: Il veut lui prendre une main. This stage direction involves a non-verbal interaction between characters.

result_list.explanation: Il grave quatre vers sur son tombeau qui seront lus par Amarille. This stage direction describes a general character action of engraving verses.

result_list.explanation: Ils s'asseyent tous. This stage direction describes a movement of characters sitting down.

Air : Dans ma cabane obscure. This stage direction describes a tune name, indicating music.
